name: EMAC-82 Autocannon
description: The EMAC-82 32mm autocannon is an electro-magnetic quad-barrel heavy machine cannon that fires 32mm kinetic rounds. The relatively low damage of kinetic shells is compensated by the high rate of fire.

name: PLS-100 Plasma Cannon
description: The PLS-100 is a plasma cannon that fires a single plasma round. The PLS-100 is a very powerful weapon that can be used to destroy almost any target.
